about_the_game:
RLLL: Tower of Choices is a single-player game that blends party-based RPG mechanics with deck-building and roguelite elements. As you control the main character, you'll face numerous choices throughout your journey. Recruit diverse companions, collect various artifacts, and learn different skills to create your unique combination as you uncover the tower's mysteries.

Game Features

Board and Dice System

The game uses a dice-rolling system for movement. This mechanic interacts with various artifact effects, allowing you to add dice, move backwards, or gain benefits from selecting specific dice numbers. It creates an engaging experience beyond simply choosing the next tile to move to.

Class Advancement and Skill Trees

Each player character has their unique skill tree, and after learning enough skills, they can advance into different classes. Each class advancement grants additional skill trees, and your abilities evolve to match your chosen class concept.

Meaningful Choices

Tower of Choices offers various decisions throughout gameplay. Choose your rewards, select companions, and decide whether to recruit or subdue other adventurers you encounter. You can choose to help those in peril - or not. Every choice meaningfully impacts your journey.

Story

A massive, ominous tower stands as a symbol of the "Age of Despair," when our world was shattered by human cruelty. When rumors spread that "your wishes can come true if you climb the tower," adventurers begin their journey, each carrying their own dreams. What secrets lie within this tower filled with dangers and mysteries?

Replay Value

With various classes, advancement options, companions, artifacts, and skill books, you can create countless unique combinations. Discover your own distinct synergies and enjoy different playstyles with each run!
